title: UPMC and Four of its Hospitals Recognized as Nation's Most Connected by U.S. News & ...
text: ( Source : Children's Hospital Pittsburgh ) UPMC and four individual hospitals within the health system have been recogznied as being among the 'most connected hospitals' for 2015-16 by U.S. News & World Report . The list includes
